effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effects.shortEffect: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon's moves for four turns.

moveDescription:

of fire appears.
